attributes.action: Make the life sentance mean LIFE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a person is charged with murder they are to be imprisoned for life (hence until the day they die), even if they are mentally ill. This is justice for the victums, it is a outrage how the UK went from the death sentance to round about 13 years as a life sentance. This is meating at the half way line, the majority of the British public would vote back a death sentance so meet half way and make life actually a life sentance.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make the life sentance mean LIFE."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14136.asp

Prime Minister's Office
